Summary: 3 to 4 orange lights over downtown one of them had a tail like a meteor
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work next to 16th and K and i look a little bit right of the coronado bridge and see these three lights and one of them looked like it was a firework it was an orange ball and reminded me of what a spark from fireworks looks like when its falling so i automatically assumed that petco was having fireworks except i didn't hear any noise and the remaining lights weren't falling they sort of hover and moved down slowly then they both disappeared. A few seconds later i see one of the lights reappear and looks as though it was moving up and down and to the side a bit, not abrupt movements but slight ones. Then the second one reappears and a few minutes later the one above it disappears. The second eventually left my view.
